page.title: 04LANGNEY SHOPPING CENTRE 1
page.content: Much of Langney Shopping Centre is a carpark.When all the car and taxi spaces are full a 1000 cars are parked in it.Langney Centre has two large supermarkets, Sainsburys and Tesco. It has quite a lot of smaller shops. On Thursdays and Fridays there is late night shopping until 8.00pm {By Siobhan Bowman age 10} When I go to Langney with my mum and dad ,we go by car on a Friday night because that is when my dad gets paid. We go to buy food for the week.We shop at Sainsburys ,but before we go into Sainsburys, I go down to Comet with my dad to get a price_list paper.Then we go into Martins the newsagents and my mum looks at the papers ,then we go into Sainsburys.We spend about Â£30 on food.When we come out we load up the car, and we get in and drive home. {By Emma Tasker age 9 }
